obr
Class GRDAnalyser

java.lang.Object
  obr.GRDAnalyser

public class GRDAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object

Analyse a graph of rule dependencies to determine if it belongs to decidable class.
Furthermore, the GRDAnalyser will check the strongly connected components of the GRD. Then, it will check if a query will be answered in a finite time.
